title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 20
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: The long-looked-for, wished-for day, at lastarrived, and the nonconforming minister of the parish of Crawford--thegodly Mr Austin--was brought from his retreat, at the town of Douglas,to perform the marriage ceremony.

title: Waverley Novels. (Abbotsford edition.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Private affairs were assigned as the causeof requesting this meeting; but it is probable thatCrevecœur, who was afraid that bis master mightbe stirred up in passion to do something dishonourably violent towards Louis, was not sorry to affordan opportunity to Crawford to give some hints tothe young Archer, which might prove useful to hismaster.
